sessionContext.label: Session context injection
sessionContext.help: Inject Working Memory and relevant memories at prompt time. Off by default — the agent can call memory_search on demand instead.

sessionDigest.label: Session digest at end
sessionDigest.help: Capture conversation threads and distill key memories via LLM at session end. On by default — negligible cost, one triage call per session.

digestMinInterval.label: Minimum digest interval (seconds)
digestMinInterval.help: Minimum seconds between session digests for the same thread. Prevents heartbeat-driven burst captures. Set to 0 for no limit.

maxContextResults.label: Max context results
maxContextResults.help: How many memories to inject for each context cycle (1–20)

apiUrl.label: Server URL (remote mode)
apiUrl.help: Leave empty for local mode (default: http://127.0.0.1:14242). For remote mode, use your Access Anywhere URL (https://...) from Mem Desktop. See: https://docs.nowledge.co/docs/remote-access

apiKey.label: API key (remote mode)
apiKey.help: Required for Access Anywhere/public HTTPS URLs. Optional for trusted LAN HTTP targets (for example http://192.168.x.x). Never logged or passed as a CLI argument — injected as NMEM_API_KEY env var only.

sessionContext.description: Inject Working Memory and recalled memories at prompt time. Off by default — the agent queries memory on demand via tools.

sessionDigest.description: Capture conversation threads and distill key memories via LLM at session end. On by default.

digestMinInterval.description: Minimum seconds between session digests for the same thread (0 = no limit). Prevents heartbeat-driven burst captures.

maxContextResults.description: Maximum memories to inject at prompt time (only used when sessionContext is enabled)

apiUrl.description: Remote Access Anywhere URL. Empty = local (http://127.0.0.1:14242). Example: https://mem.example.com

apiKey.description: API key for remote access. Required for HTTPS/public URLs; optional for trusted LAN HTTP targets. Stored in plugin config, injected as NMEM_API_KEY env var. Never logged.
